product_name: Acorn Monster Moc Slippers - Kids' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The kids' Acorn Monster Moc slippers snuggle young toes in fuzzy, monster-themed warmth and comfort for the chillier months. Polyester fleece uppers feature a monster motif for a bit of fun, fuzzy style; suede leather sidewalls enhance durability and scuff resistance. Warm faux fleece linings insulate and wick moisture away from feet to enhance comfort. Lofty memory foam insoles are layered over EVA midsoles to create plush cushioning, warmth and support. Fabric-wrapped rubber outsoles on the Acorn Monster Moc kids' slippers offer lightweight traction. Closeout.
short_description: The kids' Acorn Monster Moc slippers snuggle young toes in fuzzy, monster-themed warmth and comfort for the chillier months.
